channel.title: Deep Learning on Luyao Peng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Luyao Peng's Blog

item.title: Project: Dependency Parsing Using Deep Learning NN Model
item.description: This project extends Neural Transition-based dependeny Parsing (Stanford U cs224n A#2 Q2). The goal is to build a three layer neural network using TensorFlow to parse the dependency structure of sentences. The orignal code contributed by hankcs is built in Python2. I revised it so it runs in Python3. The training data for the neural dependency parsing model is Penn Treebank, and each sentence has ‘word’, ‘POS’, ‘head’ and ‘label’,
